long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Free, Unlimited Meeting Transcription & AI Insights – All with Privacy First!

🎉 Unlock the Power of Your Meetings – For Free!

Are you tired of restrictive free tiers and complicated pricing plans? Say goodbye to limitations and hello to Mosaic8 Free Extension! Our Chrome extension brings you free, fast, and accurate meeting transcripts and  AI-powered insights – all while keeping your data secure on your device.

🔐 Privacy-First Transcription Tool

In an era where data security is crucial, Mosaic8 ensures your sensitive information stays private. Your transcripts and recordings are securely stored locally on your device – no external servers, no third-party access.

🌟 Key Features:

📝 Instant Transcript Generation: Capture and transcribe meetings in real-time
💾 Direct Downloads: Get your transcripts in PDF, DOCX, and more – all stored locally
🧠 AI-Powered Meeting Insights: Uncover trends and key takeaways with our intelligent analysis
🔒 Privacy-First Approach: Your data never leaves your device
🎙️ Secure Meeting Recordings: Store audio files locally for complete control


💼 Who’s It For?

- Technology Professional: Keep detailed records of product and engineering discussions
- Freelancers & Consultants: Effortlessly transcribe client meetings for streamlined communication and follow-ups
- Lawyers & Legal Professionals: Securely record depositions, consultations, and meetings with full data privacy

🚀 How It Works
- Install the Mosaic8 Recorder & Transcriber Chrome Extension
- Record your meeting or conversation
- Generate an instant, accurate transcript
- Receive AI-generated summaries and insights
- Use the built-in AI assistant to explore the transcript further

💡 Why Choose Mosaic8?

Unlimited Usage: No hidden fees, no subscriptions – enjoy unlimited meeting transcriptions for free

Privacy-First Design: All data stays securely on your device, ensuring complete privacy

Seamless Integration: Works with popular conferencing tools like Google Meet, Zoom, and more

AI-Powered Analysis: Gain valuable insights from your meetings with advanced AI technology

Frequent Updates & Support: Regular improvements to ensure you always have the best experience
